attributes.action: Force full disclosure from the MOD on the UFO phenomenon.
attributes.additional_details: Duty bound for the national defender of our air space and citizens.
attributes.background:
There has been 11 years of non-investigation from the government into the UFO phenomenon. Yet, hundreds of encounters have been reported via different NGOs.
There should be full disclosure of the MOD investigations into UFOs. And to reopen a channel for encounters to be reported and investigated.

rejection.details:
You can find out how to make an FOI Request to the MOD at:

https://www.gov.uk/government/organisations/ministry-of-defence

We could publish a petition calling for the Government to restart investigations into UFOs and to open a new reporting channel as part of that, if that's what you'd like to see happen.
